body: Requesting lock after a mod answers
body_tagged: Requesting lock after a mod answers
title: How long does a ban last for?

replies.body: A ban is permanent unless you appeal support@avicus.net.
replies.body_tagged: A ban is permanent unless you appeal support@avicus.net.

replies.body:
^ What Pete said. 
Furthermore, I don't understand why a Moderator needs to answer. This community has many helpful people that aren't mods.
replies.body_tagged:
^ What Pete said. 
Furthermore, I don't understand why a Moderator needs to answer. This community has many helpful people that aren't mods.

replies.body: Ik but how long does it last for ? Forever!
replies.body_tagged: Ik but how long does it last for ? Forever!

replies.body: Kk hate avicus hate my self NOW LOCK THIS !! Nuff said:(

replies.body: Calm down. It's your own fault you got yourself banned. Send an email to appeal your ban support@avicus.net.
replies.body_tagged: Calm down. It's your own fault you got yourself banned. Send an email to appeal your ban support@avicus.net.

replies.body: Ik don't have email and i have heard that they take a while to be answered and I am not good at,emailing and all that stuff.
replies.body_tagged: Ik don't have email and i have heard that they take a while to be answered and I am not good at,emailing and all that stuff.

replies.body: But somehow  hackers are able to get unbanned
replies.body_tagged: But somehow  hackers are able to get unbanned

replies.body: Make an email. It is quick and easy. Then email support@avicus.net explaining why you think you should be unbanned. Then, wait. It is important to have patience.
replies.body_tagged: Make an email. It is quick and easy. Then email support@avicus.net explaining why you think you should be unbanned. Then, wait. It is important to have patience.

replies.body:
Explain why my comment was deleted...

Anyway, please just stop spamming the forums and leave, you made a leaving post a week ago now and there's no reason for you to still be around.

replies.body:
Maybe it was rude...
I wanted to write a reply and the post disappeared -.-
Well it was rude, but true. If you want to leave, then leave. A leaving post is annoying in my opinion. A "I'm back" post is better :D. He criticized Emerald, because he did his job. I think he is rude and not you.

replies.body: It depends how long staff ban you for...
replies.body_tagged: It depends how long staff ban you for...

replies.body: Your ban was a permanent ban. If you email support@avicus.net and make a nice, well thought out appeal, and you also are a productive forum member in the time being, you have a shot getting unbanned.
replies.body_tagged: Your ban was a permanent ban. If you email support@avicus.net and make a nice, well thought out appeal, and you also are a productive forum member in the time being, you have a shot getting unbanned.
